title: Add Multiple Actions to Account's Opportunity Data List
overview: A #Data List is configured to show an Account’s open Opportunities as a related list using a dynamic filter, with multiple action buttons combined in a single view. It uses the LWC Pipeline Data Lists, where all related Executables share the same source query, and each action is defined separately in its own Executable.
generalUseCase: Use a shared #Data List to present a focused view of records (e.g., “Open Opportunities”) and attach multiple custom actions so users can perform tailored tasks on selected records in a single place.
